sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
stretches over an area or distance
, sega od enega konca določene razdalje ali območja do drugega ali celo še dlje.

seg.quote: ...the belt of flat land which stretches from the capital up to York.

sense.def:
A stretch of land or water
je določen del zemlje ali morja.

To stretch
pomeni iztegniti roke ali noge in napeti mišice.

seg.quote: I just grunted and stretched my limbs.

sense.def:
A stretch of time
je nekaj časa.

seg.quote: Any job carries with it daily stretches of boredom.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj mehkega ali prožnega
stretches
ali
is stretched
, tisto vlečemo toliko časa, da postane napeto.

seg.quote: The skin of her face was stretched very tightly over the bones.

sense.def:
Tkanina, ki je
stretch
, se raztegne.

Kadar denar ali sredstva, ki jih ima nekdo na voljo,
are stretched
, komaj zadoščajo za njegove potrebe.

seg.quote: The nation's resources were already stretched to their limits.

sense.def:
Kadar delo ali opravilo
stretches someone
, človeka sili, da uporabi vso svojo energijo ali spretnosti.

Kadar rečemo, da nekaj ni res ali mogoče
by any stretch of the imagination
, poudarimo, da se nam tisto zdi popolnoma neresnično ali nemogoče.

seg.quote: It could by no stretch of the imagination be seen as a victory.

sense.def:
To stretch out
ali
to stretch oneself out somewhere
pomeni leči nekam tako, da so noge in trup v ravni črti.

seg.quote: I just want to stretch out in my own bed.

sense.def:
To stretch out a part of one's body
pomeni premakniti del telesa tako, da ga držimo naravnost od sebe.

seg.quote: He stretched out a thin arm and took our hands.
